$Id: README.txt 67777 2013-10-26 01:51:06Z cxh $

This directory is for the javax.mail.jar file from

http://java.net/projects/javamail/downloads/download/javax.mail.jar

If you download that file to this location, then run
cd $PTII
./configure

javax.mail.jar is used by the SendMail actor.

See also ptolemy/actor/lib/mail/JavaMail-license.htm
